title: A new Map between Quantum Gauge Theories defined on a Quantum hyperplane and ordinary Gauge Theories: q-deformed QED
abstract: We introduce a new map between a q-deformed gauge theory on a general GL_{q}(N)-covariant quantum hyperplane and an ordinary gauge theory in a full analogy with Seiberg-Witten map. Perturbative analysis of the q-deformed QED at the classical level is presented and gauge fixing a la BRST is discussed
